price: ߊ߬ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߒ ߓߘߊ߫ ߒ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ ߞߟߌ߫ ߛߎ ߘߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߕߋ߬ߟߋ ߘߐ߫
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
